### Steps to reproduce

I have a script, saved once with `.ps1` file extension, and once without.

The script:
```
#!/usr/bin/env pwsh
Write-Host $PSScriptRoot
```

When I execute the script, I'm expecting to see proper Path of a file. Unfortunately it works only then the file is named with ps1 extension. 

Why is that?

### Expected behavior

```console
PS > ./test
/tmp
PS > ./test.ps1
/tmp
```


### Actual behavior

```console
PS > ./test

PS > ./test.ps1
/tmp
```
